attributes.action: To  petition  The closure of a bail hostel  in Ashford Middlesex
attributes.additional_details: All anti social behaviour was reported to the police
attributes.background: I am a neighbour of the bail hostel in Ashford Middlesex having to put up with anti social behaviour and language

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because how to respond to anti social behaviour in a bail hostel is a decision taken by the police, local authorities and the hostel management, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find more about how bail accommodation is run in England here:

https://www.nacro.org.uk/housing/nacro-bass/
